liste.punkt: In the application for parental benefit, state that you are going to postpone because you are sick or in a health institution.
If you have already applied, log in at Your parental benefit and submit a modification application instead.

innhold.avsnitt: You must attach this to your application

liste.punkt: You have fallen ill: Attach a medical certificate from a doctor. It must describe how the illness entails that you are fully dependent on help to be able to take care of the child and how long the illness is expected to last.
You are in a health institution: Attach documentation of admission from the health institution.

innhold.avsnitt: Application deadline: You must apply within 3 months.
